Nightstrike::

Nightstrike doged the shot, by a sec he thought that he had seen that 
bot before but he wasn't sure where, but he wished win that batle. he 
shot 25 times more and said "I won't die imn this battle... I'm sure 
a bout that as my name is Nightstrike!"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> After missing the legs he turned around quickly. He slashed with his
> saber, taking out the disks. He then opend fire with the gattaling 
guns
> on his head, and lunged at Nightstrike with the saber again.
> "Die!!!!!"
